data.text: God, I am ◄very confident/trusting completely► [IDM] in you.
I will arise before the sun rises,
I prayed, “Yahweh, I will thank you among all the people-groups;
because your faithful love for us reaches up to the heavens,
Yahweh, show in the heavens that you are very great!
Answer our prayers and by your power help us [MTY] to defeat our enemies
And Yahweh answered our prayers and spoke from his temple, saying, “Because I have conquered your enemies, I will joyfully divideeverything in Shechem city
the Moab region is like my washbasin [MET];
Because we want to attack the people of Edom,
God, we hope that [RHQ] you have not abandoned us,
We need you to help us when we fight against our enemies,
But with you helping us, we shall win;
